name: The Mahjong Touhaiden
overview: The Mahjong Touhaiden is a one-on-one mahjong game for the Super Famicom. It has a few RPG elements, and each character in its diverse cast has their own strengths and weaknesses. The player can follow a story mode with a selection of playable characters, or take on the CPU in single exhibition matches. It was developed by Khaos (either a company formed from Micronics employees, or Micronics itself after a name change) for Video System. As with all mahjong games on the Super Famicom, it was never released outside of Japan.
